name: FlatOut 4: Total Insanity Workshop Tool
description: Use this tool to create your own liveries for any cars that appear in the game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows ® 7 64bit Processor: Intel® Core i3 / AMD Phenom™ II X2 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 650 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows® 10 64bit Processor: Intel® Core i5 / AMD FX 8150 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 10 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
